title: Arktura
description:
At **Arktura**, we understand the world of architecture and design—the goals, the processes, the mechanics and the art. Above all, we share the desire to break new ground and forge new possibilities for the purpose of true transformation.

We are reminded daily that the vision of every architect and designer is highly unique: an inspired force that melds and balances functional requirements with creative expression. Each one strives to push the envelope further while envisioning and creating spaces that define purpose, transform function, and exceed everyday expectations. Our clients turn to us to make the impossible, possible, and to deliver elegantly engineered, masterfully manufactured installations.

products.title: Alluvia® Custom
products.description: Even with a minimal number of modules, you can generate huge design impact using Alluvia® Custom. We offer tailorable system components in each tile so that Alluvia® Custom fulfills your design goal, whether you are working with a tall atrium or a lower-height ceiling. The end products come equipped with all the necessary attachments and mounting hardware, making installation approachable and simple. Tubes are easily removable and offer the opportunity to integrate lighting.

products.title: Atmosphera® Adaptive Analog 3D
products.description: Analog 3D is for designers who have that space in their project that is really crying out for a bold and exciting statement that can be completely customized to tell the project's story. You can influence people's movement, impression, and memory of the space in a fun creative way. Instead of following a straight path, Analog 3D allows designers to provide their own surface design or work with the Arktura team to craft the ceiling’s flow. Analog 3D’s fins are available in either powder-coated steel, for a smooth flat finish, or in our Soft Sound® material, for acoustic comfort.

products.title: Atmosphera® Adaptive Versa 3D
products.description: Atmosphera® Versa 3D unlocks new possibilities for designers looking to bring acoustic performance and storytelling to their spaces. Use undulating linear baffles to create ceiling scapes that influence people's movement, impression, and memory of the space in a fun creative way. Provide your own surface design or work with the Arktura team to craft the ceiling’s flow with fins made from our Soft Sound® acoustic material. Versa 3D’s new framing system uses inverted t-grid encased in Soft Sound®, making the system extremely flexible and easy to install, to reduce required time and costs while further enhancing acoustic comfort.

products.title: Atmosphera® Flow
products.description: Flow’s ceiling baffles form a smooth rhythm of curved fins creating organic geometries that are pleasing to the eye and reminiscent of the flowing undulation of rolling hills or ocean waves. Built with our patented Soft Sound® fins, with Flow you not only get a great design but a unique acoustic solution as well.

products.title: Atmosphera® Linea
products.description: Linea’s ceiling baffles are on the straight and narrow, providing a firm determination to your ceiling. Linea offers ample fin spacing and depth to hide integrated drop down building systems. And thanks to its Soft Sound® fins, it brings sound control to any space as well, giving you a strong design and strong acoustics.

products.title: Atmosphera® Rise
products.description: Rise’s ceiling baffles form a faceted series of geometric planes, it’s sharp angles keep your eye engaged along its path as it continues to cut back and forth peeling away new layers. But don’t worry, the path is a quiet one thanks to the Soft Sound® fins which provide acoustic control to any space on Rise’s trail.

products.title: Atmosphera® Strata
products.description: Strata’s ceiling baffles take Linea’s straight design to another level with tighter spacing and shallower fins to hide the plenum and building systems above. With this denser configuration, your design becomes a garden of structure: A peaceful one, thanks to Soft Sound® fins which provide steady acoustic control.

products.title: Atmosphera® Surf
products.description: Surf’s ceiling baffles bring the active undulation of waves into your design activating your space and its occupants. Visitors might feel as if they were ready to head out for an afternoon surfing adventure. And because of their Soft Sound® fins, standing under the panels is tranquil, as their acoustic sound control limits excess noise.

products.title: Atmosphera® Swell
products.description: Swell’s smooth geometric forms transform your thoughts and space into a tranquil oceanside paradise. Swell’s gentle pattern adds excitement while capturing the aura of billowing clouds and the gentle swell of an active ocean. Perfect for a dramatic yet elegant design, Swell incorporates our Soft Sound® fins to a good job of quieting the noise of the waves lapping against the shore.

products.title: Delta Drop® 2×4
products.description: Delta Drop® 2x4 brings faceted, dimensional geometry to your design, in a long, narrow panel. Plus, it offers easy installation, using quick torsion spring attachment across standard ceiling grid systems, or simple wall attachment using our Vertika channel system. Integrated backlighting is available if you want to add some light to your design, or try our Soft Sound® backer if you are looking for an acoustic solution.

products.title: Delta Drop® 4×4
products.description: Delta Drop® 4x4 brings faceted, dimensional geometry to your design, in a square panel that’s great for adding depth to your design. Plus, it offers easy installation, using quick torsion spring attachment across standard ceiling grid systems, or simple wall attachment using our Vertika channel system. Integrated backlighting is available if you want to add some light to your design, or try our Soft Sound® backer if you are looking for an acoustic solution.

products.title: Graphic Perf® Solutions Exterior
products.description: Have you ever wanted to bring an image or unique pattern to life in perforated metal paneling? Graphic Perf® Solutions offers two paths to make metal your canvas - Photoreal and Scripted. Whichever approach you choose, your design will be broken down into modular segments that come together seamlessly and install with flexible attachments tailored to the specific needs of your space. Arktura's team of experts is here to help you create a one-of-a-kind look that is sure to set you, and your design, apart from the crowd.

products.title: Graphic Perf® Solutions Interior
products.description: Have you ever wanted to bring an image or unique pattern to life in perforated metal paneling? Graphic Perf® Solutions offers two paths to make metal your canvas - Photoreal and Scripted. Whichever approach you choose, your design will be broken down into modular segments that come together seamlessly and install with flexible attachments tailored to the specific needs of your space. Arktura's team of experts is here to help you create a one-of-a-kind look that is sure to set you, and your design, apart from the crowd.

products.title: Particle® Code
products.description: Particle® Code affects a tech-focused aesthetic to your space with linear micro-perforations inspired by genome sequencing and lines of digital code. Similar to our Vapor® Products, this panel system is fully compatible with Arktura's Vertika® wall channel and standard grid systems, to make installation across walls and tiled ceiling systems effortless. Add available custom colors, non-woven acoustic fabric backers, to reduce noise, and Arktura's integrated lighting, and the possibilities are truly endless.

products.title: Particle® Fuse
products.description: Particle® Fuse reinterprets the linear pattern of Particle® Code into a micro-perforated design, presenting a slightly distorted impression across the tiles. Similar to our Vapor® systems, these are fully compatible with Arktura's Vertika® wall channel and standard torsion spring grid systems, to make installation across walls and ceilings effortless. Add available custom colors, non-woven acoustic fabric backers, to reduce noise, and Arktura's integrated lighting, and the possibilities are truly endless.

products.title: Particle® Ion
products.description: Particle® Ion imagines a hazy day perception by utilizing the most diffused micro-perforations of this disruptive collection. These environmentally patterned panels are entirely harmonious with Arktura's Vertika® wall channel and conventional torsion spring grid systems, to make installation across walls and ceilings effortless. Add available custom colors, non-woven acoustic fabric backers, to reduce noise, and Arktura's integrated lighting, and the possibilities are truly endless.

products.title: Particle® Phase
products.description: Particle® Phase creates a diffused checkerboard of micro-perforations by replicating pixelization of a pattern.  Like our Vapor® Family of Products, these are fully compatible with Arktura's Vertika® wall channel and standard grid systems, to make installation of unique tiles across walls and ceilings effortless. Add available custom colors, non-woven acoustic fabric backers, to reduce noise, and Arktura's integrated lighting, and the possibilities are truly endless.

products.title: Secare®
products.description: Assembled from precision-cut tubes, Secare® panels add a textural and dimensional impact to any project. The choice of round or square tubing, the luxurious aesthetic of the brushed stainless steel, and the variety of the powder coated options combine to create a versatile product range. Each preassembled module is designed to respond dynamically to the needs of your space. *Prices vary based on quantity & options. Contact your local sales representative for pricing.

products.title: SoftFold®
products.description: The complex interaction of variables lends power to design. Using our Soft Sound® acoustical material (100% PET plastic with up to 60% recycled content) and dimensional patterning, SoftFold® achieves acoustical dampening while creating a subtle play between light and shadow. It offers an award winning combination of design and functionality.

products.title: SoftGrid® Deca
products.description: Deca’s acoustic ceiling modules bring faceted, dimensional geometry to your design with its inverted hexagonal shapes. These modules can be combined with other designs for a complex pattern that fills a ceiling or be used individually for a more simple design. Either way, with their Soft Sound® material, Deca will provide you with the acoustic support you need.

products.title: SoftGrid® Dome
products.description: Dome’s acoustic ceiling modules create a curve effect on your ceiling, calling to mind gentle rolling hills. These hills can follow the length of the room or pull focus to a specific area, depending on your design’s needs. Plus, Dome’s modules are made of Soft Sound® material for acoustic comfort wherever you need it. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Flux
products.description: Flux’s acoustic ceiling modules create a geometric abstract shape, thanks to its interweaving network of panels made of Soft Sound® material that provides acoustic support where you need it. These intricate modules can connect together to provide acoustic comfort to an entire room or be used separately for a more focused design.

products.title: SoftGrid® Orbit
products.description: Orbit’s acoustic ceiling modules create a swath of honeycomb across your ceiling that provides targeted acoustic support thanks to its Soft Sound® material. Each honeycomb module can easily connect with another, to create either an intricate pattern or a full ceiling of hexagonal design.

products.title: SoftGrid® Round
products.description: Round’s acoustic ceiling modules create a circular shape using consistently spaced panels at different lengths, for a structural design that’s sure to impress while also providing acoustic support due to the Soft Sound® material. Round’s baffles create a continuous series of rings that can connect together for an intricate design that emcompasses the whole ceiling or can be focused over a singular area for focused acoustic support. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Scale
products.description: Scale’s acoustic ceiling modules create a zig-zag pattern that creates a wave due to it’s sloped width. Scale’s baffles connect together seamlessly and provide targeted acoustic support due to the Soft Sound® material. The baffles can either create a continuous, uninterrupted field or be trimmed to smaller squares, depending on your design’s needs. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Sine
products.description: Sine’s acoustic ceiling modules create waves that flow in multiple directions for a truly eye-catching pattern that can either be used individually or connected together in a continuous field. And because it’s made of our Soft Sound® material, you can get acoustic control where you need it most. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® SkyLine
products.description: SkyLine’s acoustic ceiling modules were designed to look like an inverted skyline, as if a city lived on your ceiling. For a more dramatic look, the modules can be connected together to create a continuous, uninterrupted field of cityscape or can be shortened into smaller city blocks. And to avoid the loud city noise, SkyLine is made from our Soft Sound® material, so you get acoustic comfort. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Slope
products.description: Slope’s acoustic ceiling modules are similar to Dome’s design, except Slope’s waves curve downwards in only one direction. Designed to seamlessly connect to one another by aligning baffle fins, Slope’s baffles look great as either a continuous, uninterrupted field or as smaller sloping squares. Plus, the baffles are made from our Soft Sound® material, so you can get acoustic control and elegant design in one product. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Square
products.description: Square’s acoustic ceiling modules create a linear design on your ceiling with perfectly spaced perpendicular panels. You can follow a long hallway by connecting the modules together for a seamless design, or you can use them in a targeted way by placing them in a specific location. No matter how you use them, you’ll get acoustic support thanks to the Soft Sound® material. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Switch
products.description: Switch’s acoustic ceiling modules may look like a random pattern of panels but they have been perfectly designed to create an intricate web on your ceiling. With seamless connection, you can make your web as large or as small as you want. Either way, you’ll still get acoustic support thanks to the Soft Sound® material it’s designed from. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftGrid® Wave
products.description: Wave’s acoustic ceiling modules follow their namesake and create a wave pattern that flows easily across your ceiling. You can have a wave that encompasses a whole room or just a small area, thanks to the easy connection of the modules. And with our Soft Sound® material, you can get acoustic support right where you want it. And now, for larger jobs, with the addition of SoftGrid® Max options, you can do it all while maximizing value and minimizing the impact on the environment.

products.title: SoftScreen® Alcazar
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Alcazar’s acoustic panels and partitions create a design inspired by the Alcazar palace in Seville, a repeating pattern of triangles and lines that add up to an image you can’t look away from. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. Alcazar is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind. Made from our Soft Sound material, they also provide sound control exactly where you need it.

products.title: SoftScreen® Cora
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Cora’s acoustic panels and partitions reimagine a timeless pattern. By adding scattered solid forms to the diamond grid, you get a modern take on a classic look that is sure to turn heads — though they’ll keep sound control exactly where you need it thanks to their Soft Sound material. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. Cora is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind.

products.title: SoftScreen® Frequency
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Frequency’s panels and partitions bring the digital world into reality. With a design that starts off intense and fades away, you can create a dynamic pattern that’s sure to catch eyes. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. No matter how they are mounted, you’ll get targeted sound control where you need it due to their Soft Sound material. Frequency is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind.

products.title: SoftScreen® Glimmer
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Glimmer’s panels and partitions take the standard grid and easily transform it into a unique pattern that achieves incredible movement across any space thanks to their fluctuating perforations. They can also stop sound movement, thanks to their Soft Sound material. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. Glimmer is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind.

products.title: SoftScreen® Groove Angled
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Groove Angled panels and partitions bring a lively texture to spaces while creating a barrier from noise and air current. Use its linear pattern in a single direction or to zig-zag across a space. Choose from 3 spacing options for its angled lines, all providing acoustic comfort thanks to their Soft Sound®️ construction. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, and Sliding Track mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. Ask about Groove Wall Coverings for Direct mounting applications or refer to the final page of the product brochure for more info.

products.title: SoftScreen® Groove Straight
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Groove Straight panels and partitions give a subtle linear texture to spaces while creating a barrier from noise and air current. Choose from 3 spacing options for its vertical lines, all providing acoustic comfort thanks to their Soft Sound®️ construction. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, and Sliding Track mounting methods to fit the needs of your space. Ask about Groove Wall Coverings for Direct mounting applications or refer to the final page of the product brochure for more info.

products.title: SoftScreen® Rain
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Rain’s panels and partitions bring to mind a gentle spring rain, imbuing the world with new growth. By placing them strategically, the Soft Sound material helps you limit noise distribution. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space.

products.title: SoftScreen® Slant
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Slant’s panels and partitions bring to life modern geometric design, calling to mind elegant galas and sophisticated balls. And thanks to the Soft Sound material, you can also achieve targeted sound control, without sacrificing elegant design. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space.

products.title: SoftScreen® Solid
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Solid’s panels and partitions are just that — solid. Perfect for areas where privacy is needed, these panels can use Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space, and because they are made from our Soft Sound material, they provide privacy from noise as well.

products.title: SoftScreen® Stack
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Stack’s panels and partitions bring to mind paper lanterns stacked on top of each other. The extra empty space in this design makes it perfect for areas where extra visual privacy is not necessary, though they can still provide some acoustic privacy thanks to their Soft Sound material. Stack is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space.

products.title: SoftScreen® Stellar
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Stellar’s panels and partitions call to mind a clear night spent gazing up at the stars, watching them wink gently above you. And their Soft Sound material can keep that peaceful feeling by providing acoustic control where you need it. Stellar is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space.

products.title: SoftScreen® Trace
products.description: SoftScreen®️ Trace’s panels and partitions create a web that viewers will be captured by, with an arresting array of interconnected threads that also provide acoustic support thanks to its Soft Sound material. Trace is available in full and half pattern panels to provide flexibility in acoustic performance and peace of mind. Choose from Hanging Bracket, Cable Hung, Sliding Track, and Direct mounting methods to fit the needs of your space.

products.title: Soft Sound® Tiles
products.description: Soft Sound®️  Tiles are the perfect building blocks to easily and affordably enhance aesthetics and acoustic performance across interior space. Made from Arktura's Soft Sound®️ Acoustical material, Soft Sound®️ Tiles can be simply adhered to wall surfaces to absorb sound while creating limitless design opportunities. Mix and match its five standard sizes and dozens of color options, including wood textures, to create the best design for your project. Tiles can also be field trimmed to effortlessly adapt to surrounding building conditions and create endless possibilities.

products.title: SoftSpan® 24
products.description: SoftSpan® 24 is a versatile ceiling baffle system that brings the look of closely gridded coffered ceilings or timber trellises to spaces without the weight, while enhancing acoustics and reducing the impact of noise. Add Soft Sound® coffer panels to create an enclosed look and further enhance the acoustics of your space. Fully compatible with SoundBar® acoustic baffle and lighting system.

products.title: SoftSpan® 48 A
products.description: SoftSpan® 48A is a versatile ceiling baffle system that brings the look of closely gridded coffered ceilings or timber trellises to spaces without the weight, while enhancing acoustics and reducing the impact of noise. Add Soft Sound® coffer panels to create an enclosed look and further enhance the acoustics of your space. Fully compatible with SoundBar® acoustic baffle and lighting system.

products.title: SoftSpan® 48
products.description: SoftSpan® 48 is a versatile ceiling baffle system that brings the look of closely gridded coffered ceilings or timber trellises to spaces without the weight while enhancing acoustics and reducing the impact of noise. Add Soft Sound® coffer panels to create an enclosed look and further enhance the acoustics of your space. Fully compatible with SoundBar® acoustic baffle and lighting system.

products.title: SoftSpan® 96
products.description: SoftSpan® 96 creates a sense of magnitude with its large trellis beams that are still scalable across spaces big and small. It is a versatile ceiling baffle system that brings the look of coffered ceilings or timber trellises to spaces without the weight, while enhancing acoustics and reducing the impact of noise.

products.title: SoundAngle®
products.description: SoundAngle® ceiling system’s V-shaped baffles offer a scalable way to add dimensionality and decrease acoustical reverberations across spaces. Its angled face design and construction from our Soft Sound® acoustical material combine to dramatically reduce noise from all directions. SoundAngle® can be configured in numerous ways to adapt to existing structural elements and fit your design vision. Choose from two depths and a range of lengths, all available in a variety of colors and finishes, including wood-grain textures.

products.title: SoundBar®
products.description: SoundBar® acoustical baffle & lighting system delivers high performance noise reduction and sleek integrated illumination in a single cost-effective, versatile product. Choose from an assortment of lengths, widths, and depths, in Up or Down lighting configurations, with power integrated into its suspension cable, simplifying install and removing the unsightly clutter of cords. Its Arktura Soft Sound® acoustical material construction makes SoundBar® capable of achieving NRC ratings of up to 1.15. Units are available in a wide range of colors, including wood textures, and can be easily mixed and arranged as desired to achieve an endless array of dynamic layouts. SoundBar® now also offers interconnectivity with SoftSpan® 24, 48, and 48A, to create unique configurations that utilize both acoustic and illuminated solutions, bringing an impactful combination of style & function to your next project.

products.title: SoundEdge®
products.description: SoundEdge® ceiling system offers flexible building blocks to easily achieve enhanced acoustical performance and design effects. Its modular single fin design, available in a multitude of lengths and depths, is easy to install, and can be mixed and matched in numerous configurations. SoundEdge® is constructed from our Soft Sound® acoustical material (100% PET plastic with up to 60% recycled content) to drastically reduce sound reverberation.

products.title: SoundStar®
products.description: SoundStar® ceiling system’s hexagonally shaped cellular coffers offer a scalable way to add geometric dimensionality and disrupt sound’s ability to travel across a space. Each module is comprised of angled surfaces made from our Soft Sound® acoustical material (100% PET plastic with up to 60% recycled content) with a metal substructure. Choose from 12” or 24” deep modules, to mix and match as desired. Thanks to its flexible, modular configuration, SoundStar® can adapt to a range of spaces and design visions, to create a spectacular visual effect. The design and sound capturing capabilities of this system offer a fresh effective approach to high performance sound attenuation.

products.title: Sphera®
products.description: In Arktura's Sphera® ceiling system, cloud-like groupings of rings create visual interest through an interplay of organic and geometric design cues. Play with its repeated circular shapes at varying depths and orientations to morph your design pattern, and allow this easy-to-install, wire-suspended system to redefine all types of space - from the smallest reception areas to the widest open spans.

products.title: Switch 48®
products.description: Switch 48® is a carefully composed collection of aluminum rods held in three-dimensional space. The preconfigured modules create a fine-grained, multidimensional layer of pattern and color and can be easily suspended at different heights and in many configurations using our quick connect system.

products.title: Trace® Curved
products.description: Curved’s powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels use gently curved, thin lines for a beautiful symphony of movement. Elevate the symphony with our optional InLine lighting or keep the sound down, with our Soft Sound® backer. Or, if you need additional brightness, add our backlighting.

products.title: Trace® Skew
products.description: Skew’s powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring modern elegance to any design, with it’s thin, interwoven lines. Add our optional InLine lighting for a beautiful glow, our backlighting for additional brightness or our Soft Sound® backer for sound control.

products.title: Trace® Slant
products.description: Slant’s powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring to life a modern, geometric design that fills a room with energy thanks to the long thin and thick lines that create a feeling of fast motion. Add our optional backlighting for a vibrant design, our InLine lighting for gentle illumination, or our Soft Sound® backer for sound control.

products.title: Trace® Slide
products.description: Trace® Slide's 2'x4' powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels evoke the outdoors through their biomorphic pattern that echoes the imagery of babbling brooks or ancient tree bark. Add visual depth and illumination to your space by incorporating our integrated InLine Lighting or Backlighting options. Or optimize wellness by enhancing acoustic comfort and reducing the impact of noise with our high-performance Soft Sound® backers.

products.title: Trace® Straight
products.description: Straight’s powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels create a web-like pattern with plenty of places to get caught in the design, especially when our optional InLine lighting is added. Or, for additional brightness, try our backlighting option. If acoustic support is what you need, then opt for our Soft Sound® backer instead.

products.title: TriSoft®
products.description: TriSoft® ceiling system makes it easy to add faceted dimensionality and quiet elegance to interiors. Its triangular faceted pyramid faces are composed of our Soft Sound® acoustical material (100% PET plastic with up to 60% recycled content) with a metal substructure. Mix and match TriSoft’s® available modules and nodes as building blocks to build faceted straight field layouts scalable to any size space. With a variety of color options, and specially engineered attachment brackets, TriSoft® is designed for maximum impact, flexibility, convenience, and acoustic performance.

products.title: Vapor® Bloom
products.description: Vapor® Bloom’s 2'x4' powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring life to spaces through biomorphic patterning that subtly evokes images of scattered foliage or blossoming petals. Add visual depth and illumination to your space by incorporating our integrated InLine Lighting or Backlighting options. Or optimize wellness by enhancing acoustic comfort and reducing the impact of noise with our high-performance Soft Sound® backers.

products.title: Vapor® Bond
products.description: Formulate a unique pattern for your next project with Vapor® Bond, or mix and match with its family friend VaporHue® Link. Featuring hexagonal shapes invoking motion that is anything but static. This design flows freely throughout wall or ceiling installations based on its patterns of connectivity and interaction. Continuous patterns allow you to scale this design to any space without interruption. Pair with optional accessories such as acoustic backers or lighting options to elevate your custom layout.

products.title: Vapor® Breeze
products.description: Vapor® Breeze’s 2'x4' powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels create an organic feel through organic natural inspirations echoing the flurry of air and the murmuration of butterflies. The pattern continues seamlessly from panel to panel, and with the option of Soft Sound® backers, you can evoke nature while reducing the amount of ambient noise. For added dynamic effect, try our integrated backlighting to illuminate your space and form a design that truly shines

products.title: Vapor® Byte
products.description: Byte´s torsion spring panels square-shaped holes bring algorithms to life in your real-world design. With the addition of our optional integrated lighting, Byte’s illuminated pattern can take your design to the next level. Or add our Soft Sound® backer to address more down-to-earth needs, such as reducing echos.

products.title: Vapor® Cluster
products.description: With Cluster, we’ve transformed perforated torsion spring panels into an elegant ceiling-scape. By staggering the location of the holes, we’ve upgraded a standard grid into an eye-catching design that will get viewers talking. Choose from two levels of perforation density: Cluster Dense and Cluster Sparse. Cluster also works with both our optional integrated lighting and Soft Sound® acoustic backer to help you get the right aesthetic — and sound — for your design.

products.title: Vapor® Cora
products.description: Don’t settle for standard. Cora aluminum torsion spring panels reimagine a timeless pattern. By adding scattered solid forms to the diamond grid, you get a modern take on a classic look that is sure to turn heads. However, if your design still needs more energy, try adding our optional integrated lighting or our Soft Sound® backers for extra acoustic comfort.

products.title: Vapor® Cumula
products.description: Cumula powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels take inspiration from a beautiful spring day, giving your design the ephemeral feeling of a cloudy sky. The pattern continues seamlessly from panel to panel, and with the addition of our Soft Sound® backer, you can also reduce the amount of ambient noise. Or try our integrated lighting backer if you want a design that shines.

products.title: Vapor® Element
products.description: Vapor® Element powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels take the standard grid and enhance it with elegant minimalism. With equal-sized circular holes evenly spaced on each panel, your design gets a feeling of consistency and cohesion. Pair with our integrated backlighting for an illuminated look or with our Soft Sound® backer for acoustic benefits.

products.title: Vapor® Frequency
products.description: Frequency powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring the digital world into reality. With a design that starts off intense and fades away, you can create a path for people to follow, while reducing the sound of their steps thanks to our Soft Sound® backer. Or add our integrated lighting backer to take the digital feel to another level.

products.title: Vapor® Gradients
products.description: Gradients’ powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels take the standard grid and easily transform it into unique patterns that achieve incredible movement across any space. One of the most versatile designs in the Vapor® line, Gradients allows you to create one-of-a-kind layouts that fade in and out as desired. If you want to also add acoustic comfort, add our Soft Sound® backer, or if you want the design backlit, add our integrated lighting option.

products.title: Vapor® Graphic Perf®
products.description: Vapor® Graphic Perf® turns wall and ceiling tiles into a limitless canvas, combining the best aspects of two of Arktura's most popular offerings - Vapor® and Graphic Perf® - into one versatile system. Let Arktura apply its proprietary, algorithmic software and manufacturing expertise to transfer any image or pattern into perforated metal torsion spring panels. Like our Vapor® Family of Products, these are fully compatible with Arktura's Vertika® wall channel and standard grid systems, to make installation across walls and ceilings effortless. Add available custom color, Soft Sound® acoustic backer panels, and Arktura's integrated lighting, and the opportunities are truly endless.

products.title: VaporHue™ Astra
products.description: VaporHue™ Astra aluminum torsion spring panels evoke speed, motion, and directionality through its linear perfs and printed patterning. Use its seamless patterning across walls or ceilings to direct the eyes of visitors or simply to bring energy to a space. Add visual depth and illumination to your space by incorporating our integrated InLine Lighting or Backlighting options. Or optimize wellness by enhancing acoustic comfort and reducing the impact of noise with our high-performance Soft Sound® backers.

products.title: VaporHue™ Flora
products.description: VaporHue™ Flora aluminum torsion spring panels layer organic printing in dual colors over feathering perforations to evoke a biophilic floral landscape. The pattern is designed to flow seamlessly from panel to panel across walls or ceilings. Want to bring even more utility and life to your space? Try our integrated backlighting and inline options, to illuminate your space and create a design that truly shines. Or explore our range of Soft Sound® backers, to evoke nature while reducing ambient noise, and adding another layer of depth and color.

products.title: VaporHue™ Link
products.description: VaporHue™ Link printed and perforated aluminum torsion spring panels utilize fragmented hexagons in printing and perforation to create a layered geometric three-dimensional cube effect, unifying surfaces across walls and ceiling. Use it to bring cohesion and modern and elegant depth to spaces. Use our optional integrated lighting or Soft Sound® backer options to take your design to the next level, adding illumination and noise reduction.

products.title: VaporHue™ Pop
products.description: VaporHue™ Pop printed and perforated aluminum torsion spring panels add a layers of depth with perforated circles and finely dithered printed dots, reminiscent of classical printing methods, with a modern twist. Both our Soft Sound® acoustic backer and integrated InLine and Backlighting options can be used with this design, to dramatic effect.

products.title: VaporHue™ Stitch
products.description: VaporHue™ Stitch printed and perforated aluminum torsion spring panels zip through spaces with a bi-directional linearity. If you want to also add acoustic comfort, add our Soft Sound® backer, or to make your design truly shine, add our integrated Backlighting and InLine light options, to illuminate spaces and create dynamic lighting effects.

products.title: Vapor® Liana
products.description: Liana powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring soft vine tendrils, creating the illusion of a hanging garden or lost jungle to your design. Bring an outdoor feel indoors without having to tend to your fantasy garden. Add our Soft Sound® backer for extra acoustic comfort or our integrated lighting backer to get viewers lost in reverie.

products.title: Vapor® Pixel
products.description: Pixel powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring the essence of coding into your design with lines of multi-sized circles staggered along each panel. So when paired with our integrated lighting backer, you get more illumination. Or pair with our Soft Sound® Backer if you are looking for more acoustic benefits.

products.title: Vapor® Shift X
products.description: Shift X powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels layer nature-inspired patterns giving spaces an organic quality emulates that natural growth. By layering differently sized patterns overtop of each other, you can create both depth and interest. Both our Soft Sound® acoustic backer and integrated lighting backer can be used with this design, to dramatic effect.

products.title: Vapor® Sky
products.description: Sky powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels offer a tileable, cloud-like pattern, helping you bring the sky indoors. With no fading of the pattern, the cloud design can continue for as long as your hallway or space allows, without sacrificing acoustical comfort if you add our Soft Sound® backer. Or you can add our integrated lighting backer for a sky that glows.

products.title: VaporSoft® Cluster
products.description: Cluster has transformed perforated torsion spring panels into an elegant ceiling-scape. By staggering the location of the holes, we’ve upgraded a standard grid into an eye-catching design that will get viewers talking. Choose from two levels of perforation density: Cluster Dense and Cluster Sparse. Cluster is made from our Soft Sound® material to provide acoustic support, but if you want to really elevate your look, add our optional integrated backlighting. You’ll get both acoustic control and a beautiful glow.

products.title: VaporSoft® Cora
products.description: Cora’s torsion spring panels reimagine a timeless pattern. By adding scattered solid forms to the diamond grid, you get a modern take on a classic look that is sure to turn heads. Thanks to the Soft Sound material, you’ll always get acoustic support. And if you add our optional backlighting, you can also get an eye-catching radiance.

products.title: VaporSoft® Trail
products.description: Trail’s torsion spring panels feature a linear design of multi-sized circles, creating a flowing effect designed to evoke emotion. Each line of larger circles tapers off with smaller circles to create a trail you’ll want to follow — but won’t hear, thanks to its Soft Sound material. And if you really want to blaze a trail, add our optional backlighting.

products.title: Vapor® Solid
products.description: Bring forth stunning textural vision with the endless possibilities of Vapor® Solid. These 2’x4’ Torsion spring ceiling and Vertika® Wall panels flow continuously throughout, transitioning from wall to ceiling, allowing you to cover any space thanks to easy installation and accessibility. These solid panels come in a wide array of powder-coated finishes with multiple color and metallic options to mix and match with other Vapor® patterns, or create a Mondrian style installation with color blocking. Optional inline lighting accessories are available to further customize your projects intent.

products.title: Vapor® Syntax
products.description: Syntax powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels bring the digital world to your design. The staggered pattern ensures each panel flows smoothly into the next for an uninterrupted pattern. If you are looking for more illumination, try adding our integrated lighting backer. Or if you want more acoustic benefits, try adding our Soft Sound® backer instead.

products.title: Vapor® Trail
products.description: Trail powder-coated aluminum torsion spring panels feature a linear design of multi-sized circles, creating a flowing effect designed to evoke emotion. Each line of larger circles tapers off with smaller circles to create a trail you’ll want to follow, especially when paired with our integrated lighting backer. But if you don’t want to hear people following the trail, add our Soft Sound® backer and reduce excess noise.

products.title: Vapor® Transit
products.description: Create energetic emotion in any space with the perforated wall and ceiling panels of Vapor® Transit, whether an accent piece or a full-scale installation. A rich blend of cut-out dots, lines, and patterns evokes an arial view of a city street. Pair these textural panels with Vapor’s full line of accessories such as Soft Sound® Backers, Arktura backlighting, or inline lighting to provide both illumination and acoustic performance.

products.title: Vapor® Verve
products.description: Staggered linear perforations of various dimensions make up the in-motion pattern of Vapor® Verve. Able to be perfectly paired with VaporHue® Astra, this design can be viewed continuously with a seamless transition from wall to ceiling panels thanks to fully scalable and tileable configurations. Add optional accessories such as Soft Sound®, or Arktura’s integrated lighting accessories, to illuminate and attenuate in any space.

products.title: Vertika® Wall Channel System
products.description: Vertika® wall channel system enables Arktura's growing lineup of torsion panel products to effortlessly span walls or achieving seamless wall-to-ceiling transitions. It is designed to make installation simple while keeping in mind ease of access for ongoing maintenance. Add available options and accessories, including Arktura's integrated InLine or Backlight lighting, acoustic and translucent backers, and there is no limit to the effects you can achieve. Pair it with Vapor®, VaporHue™, VaporSoft®, Delta Drop®, Trace®, Particle™, or Vapor® Graphic Perf® today.
